page.title: 02WHISTON BROOK
page.content: { { In the extreme north-west of the area in Whiston Village a wider range of entertainment exists for the visitor. A picnic area exists alongside Whiston Brook.This used to be an unused and derelict area, but the local Parish Council have raised money to plant trees and provide wooden picnic benches and tables.The brook meanders through this flat and marshy area and then opens out into a small pond. The pond is popular for local children because of the variety of plant life and an opportunity to collect Frog Spawn and Sticklebacks.
